lenght of contraction.description: The length of the contraction in milliseconds

Contraction times.description: The number of times contraction occurred

Pre-term.description: Indicates if the birth was preterm (1) or not (0)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in medical data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the contraction data of the pregnant women, please predict if the birth was preterm.
prompt.answer_prompt: The birth was preterm[1] or not[0]?
